title: Animals see in many ways. - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: Marjorie Bean, Norman Bean and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: This film illustrates the differences in the eyes of various animals, from the simple eyes of an insect to the complex eyes of a back-boned animal. It shows that the kind and position of an animal’s eyes are clues to the animal’s way of life. Suitable for primary school level.
